findings.title: Use of tx.origin for authorization
findings.explanation: The contract uses tx.origin to verify the owner, which can be tricked via a malicious intermediary contract. tx.origin does not provide secure access control and can be bypassed if the owner interacts with a malicious contract.
findings.fix_suggestion: Use msg.sender for ownership checks (e.g., require(msg.sender == owner)) or implement a proper onlyOwner modifier for access control.
